content: When you've beaten the final cart, you'll receive the Flame Orb Curio. Head over to the area on the right before the doorway and speak to the Pale-Axe Stalwart one final time.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Cooling Slope' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Rusty-Gold Cart'.
The content is as follows:
When you've beaten the final cart, you'll receive the Flame Orb Curio. Head over to the area on the right before the doorway and speak to the Pale-Axe Stalwart one final time.
